resources.string: Have you been within 6 feet of a person with a lab-confirmed case of COVID-19 for at least 5 minutes, or had direct contact with their mucus or saliva, in the past 14 days?
In the last 48 hours, have you had any of the following NEW symptoms?
Do you have any of the following possible emergency symptoms?
Is the person age is below 5?
Based on what you described, here is what we would recommend:
Call 911 or your local emergency number!
This may be a medical emergency. Your breathing trouble may be caused by a life-threatening lung or heart problem. You may need emergency treatment on the way to the hospital.
